HomePage.areaofworkp: We create meaningful cultural exchanges and sustainable partnerships across eight key areas.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.paragraph1: The European Cultural Centre Nigeria/West Africa is a non-profit institution and serves as the umbrella for promoting diverse European cultures and fostering meaningful cultural exchange in collaboration with our partners.
mission.paragraph2: We connect more than through cultural exchanges and advocate for the vital role of culture in international relations. We bring European cultural collaboration to life connecting more than through cultural exchanges and advocate for a prominent role of culture in international relations.
mission.paragraph3: Our Centre provides a dynamic platform for knowledge sharing, capacity building, and exchange programs — linking Nigeria, Africa, Europe, and the wider global community.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.paragraph1: Through culture, education, innovation, and cultural exchange, the European Cultural Centre Nigeria/West Africa strives to build trust and mutual understanding between European countries and Africa as a whole.
vision.paragraph2: We are dedicated to making culture a key element in international relations. We work through fair partnerships, grounded in mutual listening, learning, and action engaging in cultural exchanges and joint capacity-building efforts both locally and internationally.

values.title: Our Values
values.description: We believe that culture is a vital force for inclusive growth, mutual understanding, and sustainable development locally, across Africa, and around the world.

items.title: Art and the Creative Industries
items.description: Promoting creativity and supporting artists across Africa and Europe.

items.title: Digitalization and Innovation
items.description: Embracing technology and innovation for cultural advancement.

items.title: Education, Training, and Skills Development
items.description: Empowering communities through learning and capacity building.

items.title: Gender Equality and Women’s Empowerment
items.description: Championing equal opportunities and leadership for women.

items.title: Cultural Heritage and Preservation
items.description: Safeguarding and celebrating our shared cultural legacy.

items.title: Human Rights and Social Inclusion
items.description: Advocating for justice, equity, and inclusive societies.

items.title: Languages and Multilingualism
items.description: Promoting language learning and cross-cultural communication.

items.title: International Student Exchange Programs
items.description: Connecting students globally for shared learning experiences.

items.title: Youth Engagement and Empowerment
items.description: Supporting young leaders and changemakers.

items.title: Sports and Tourism
items.description: Building bridges through sports and cultural travel.

items.title: Environmental Sustainability
items.description: Driving climate action and environmental stewardship.

items.description: Facilitating collaboration and cultural exchange between continents.

items.description: Attracting investment for impactful projects in Nigeria and Africa.

CulturalHeritageTours.heroDescription: Journey through time with expert-guided tours to UNESCO World Heritage sites, traditional festivals, and cultural landmarks that preserve Africa's rich heritage.

tours.title: Heritage Tour Categories
tours.description: Choose from our curated selection of cultural heritage experiences.

items.title: Ancient Heritage Sites
items.description: Explore millennia-old archaeological sites with expert historians and archaeologists.

items.title: Cultural Festivals & Traditions
items.description: Immerse in living traditions through festivals, ceremonies, and cultural celebrations.

items.title: Art & Craft Heritage
items.description: Discover traditional crafts, artistic techniques, and creative heritage preservation.

items.title: Sacred & Spiritual Sites
items.description: Visit sacred places and learn about spiritual traditions and religious heritage.

itinerary.title: Sample Day Tour: Osun-Osogbo Sacred Grove
itinerary.description: Experience Nigeria's UNESCO World Heritage site with expert guides and cultural immersion.

items.activity: Guided tour with UNESCO heritage expert
Osogbo Art Gallery and craft workshops

items.name: Dr. Maria Santos
items.text: The heritage tour provided incredible insights into Nigeria's cultural traditions. The expert guides made history come alive.
items.text1: An unforgettable life's journey through living heritage. The access to sacred sites and cultural ceremonies was extraordinary.

cta.title: Ready to Explore Cultural Heritage?
cta.description: Book your heritage tour today and experience Africa’s living traditions, ancient sites, and vibrant festivals with expert guides. Discover the stories that connect past, present, and future.

attractions.title: Upcoming Tours & Events
attractions.description: Join us in 2026 as we explore Nigeria’s top destinations and festivals.

obudu.description: A paradise in the clouds with cable cars, mountain views, and eco-tourism lodges.

ogbunike.description: Ancient caves with spiritual history, lush greenery, and natural tunnels.

calabar.description: Africa’s biggest street party with dance, costumes, and cultural showcases.

yankari.description: Safari adventures, natural warm springs, and Nigeria’s best wildlife park.

erin.title: Erin-Ijesha Waterfalls
erin.description: Seven layers of waterfalls cascading through tropical forest trails.

awhum.description: Sacred natural wonder with religious significance and serene landscapes.

sukur.title: Sukur Cultural Landscape

yobe.description: Explore Nigeria’s desert dunes and Fulani cultural heritage.

cta.title: Ready to Discover Nigeria?

overview.heading: 1. Overview
overview.text: We respect your privacy and comply with GDPR and relevant European regulations.

personalData.heading: 2. Personal Data We Collect
personalData.voluntary: Voluntary submission: names, emails, organization data, event registration details.
personalData.automatic: Automatic collection: IP address, device/browser type, site navigation patterns (via minimal, privacy-friendly analytics).

useOfInformation.heading: 3. Use of Information
useOfInformation.text: Your data helps us manage registrations, send updates, administer events, and improve our services.

cookies.heading: 4. Cookies & Analytics
cookies.text: We use essential cookies for functionality and may deploy privacy-focused analytics to understand usage trends without compromising anonymity.

dataSharing.heading: 5. Data Sharing & Transfers
dataSharing.text: We do not sell your data. We may share it with service providers (hosting, analytics, communications), but only under GDPR-compliant agreements. Data doesn’t leave the EEA unless strictly necessary and legally permissible.

dataRetention.heading: 6. Data Retention
dataRetention.text: We keep personal data only as long as needed—for legitimate purposes, legal obligations, or until withdrawal of consent. After that, data is securely deleted or anonymized.

gdprRights.heading: 7. Your Rights Under GDPR
rightsList: Erase your data ("right to be forgotten")
gdprRights.footer: Submit such requests via the website's contact mechanism.

security.heading: 8. Security Measures
security.text: We take reasonable technical and organizational measures to protect your data—encryption, access controls, and regular reviews.

policyUpdates.heading: 9. Policy Updates
policyUpdates.text: We may update this policy. The latest version will always be available on the site, and significant changes may be communicated via email or site announcements.

contact.heading: 10. Contact
contact.text: For any privacy concerns or requests, reach out via our website’s contact form or the email provided on the site.

acceptance.heading: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.text: By accessing or using this website, you agree to abide by these Terms of Use in full. If you're not on board, stop here.

purpose.heading: 2. Purpose and Scope
purpose.text: This site is dedicated to showcasing Intercontinental Values, Cultural Exchange, Tourism, Sports, Knowledge Exchange, Creativity, Language Exchange, Climate Change, Humanitarian activities, Inclusion, Innovation and every topic displayed on our “AREAS OF WORK”—via exhibitions, events, publications, and dialogue. Use it respectfully.

conduct.heading: 3. User Conduct
conduct.text: You must not misuse the website—no illegal content, hacking, impersonation, or infringement on intellectual property or others’ privacy.

intellectualProperty.heading: 4. Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.text: All content on this site—text, images, videos, logos—is protected by copyright. You may not print or download for personal, nor commercial use. Any use requires explicit written consent.

registration.heading: 5. Registration and Forms
registration.text: If you register for events or mailing lists, you must provide accurate information. Submitting a form implies acceptance of these Terms and any ancillary terms communicated at submission.

disclaimers.heading: 6. Disclaimers & Modifications
disclaimers.text: Content may change from time to time. We strive for accuracy. Changes will be communicated via mail if you are our newsletter subscriber.

law.heading: 7. Governing Law
law.text: These Terms are governed by the relevant laws of the European Union.

amendments.heading: 8. Amendments
amendments.text: We may update these Terms at any time. Continued use after changes means you accept them.
